==Building Xixibase server==
===Windows:===
 # Please check the directory.
{{{
xixibase/3rd/boost
        /client
        /src
}}}
 # run build.bat

===Linux/Mac:===
 # Please check the directory.
{{{
xixibase/3rd/boost
        /client
        /src
}}}
 # chmod +x build.sh
 # run ./build.sh
